<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Insert disconnected block \\p NewBlock before \\p Blockptr. First</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// disconnects all predecessors of \\p BlockPtr and connects them to \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// NewBlock. Add \\p NewBlock as predecessor of \\p BlockPtr and \\p BlockPtr as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// successor of \\p NewBlock.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a69d51be488551c2983a022bb98494901"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a69d51be488551c2983a022bb98494901">insertBlockBefore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;NewBlock, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;BlockPtr) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NewBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#aeccf6a036968755c6d86e2d2bb17673a">getSuccessors</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">           NewBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a73370de0db181ec55a9ad0b7a3a78a88">getPredecessors</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Can&#39;t insert new block with predecessors or successors.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    NewBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#ae2be49bdbbda0aeadd51549f4b88c839">setParent</a>(BlockPtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a09de70cbaf2f15aa3b0697b5f378cc9d">getParent</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;Pred : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a886094eaed7ce32029ea52a641142b88">to&#95;vector</a>(BlockPtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a2526abff3e6d88edde3f67cc61842e74">predecessors</a>())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a61f1451694a3638db85170c7f55d5581">disconnectBlocks</a>(Pred, BlockPtr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a40bc7fec35d7093efcdbadf566d6b5ee">connectBlocks</a>(Pred, NewBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a40bc7fec35d7093efcdbadf566d6b5ee">connectBlocks</a>(NewBlock, BlockPtr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Insert disconnected VPBlockBases \\p IfTrue and \\p IfFalse after \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// BlockPtr. Add \\p IfTrue and \\p IfFalse as succesors of \\p BlockPtr and \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// BlockPtr as predecessor of \\p IfTrue and \\p IfFalse. Propagate \\p BlockPtr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// parent to \\p IfTrue and \\p IfFalse. \\p BlockPtr must have no successors</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and \\p IfTrue and \\p IfFalse must have neither successors nor</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// predecessors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a3a43b6445802190031bda62347e97453"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a3a43b6445802190031bda62347e97453">insertTwoBlocksAfter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;IfTrue, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;IfFalse,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;BlockPtr) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(IfTrue-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#aeccf6a036968755c6d86e2d2bb17673a">getSuccessors</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Can&#39;t insert IfTrue with successors.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(IfFalse-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#aeccf6a036968755c6d86e2d2bb17673a">getSuccessors</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Can&#39;t insert IfFalse with successors.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">    BlockPtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#aa13d3b4d460075f3bb6a6eeb6a5e9bd7">setTwoSuccessors</a>(IfTrue, IfFalse);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">    IfTrue-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a6a02d7faad162c3e17d0c522d032320b">setPredecessors</a>(&#123;BlockPtr&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">    IfFalse-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a6a02d7faad162c3e17d0c522d032320b">setPredecessors</a>(&#123;BlockPtr&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">    IfTrue-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#ae2be49bdbbda0aeadd51549f4b88c839">setParent</a>(BlockPtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a09de70cbaf2f15aa3b0697b5f378cc9d">getParent</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">    IfFalse-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#ae2be49bdbbda0aeadd51549f4b88c839">setParent</a>(BlockPtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a09de70cbaf2f15aa3b0697b5f378cc9d">getParent</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Connect VPBlockBases \\p From and \\p To bi-directionally. If \\p PredIdx is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// -1, append \\p From to the predecessors of \\p To, otherwise set \\p To&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// predecessor at \\p PredIdx to \\p From. If \\p SuccIdx is -1, append \\p To to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the successors of \\p From, otherwise set \\p From&#39;s successor at \\p SuccIdx</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to \\p To. Both VPBlockBases must have the same parent, which can be null.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Both VPBlockBases can be already connected to other VPBlockBases.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a40bc7fec35d7093efcdbadf566d6b5ee"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a40bc7fec35d7093efcdbadf566d6b5ee">connectBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;To,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PredIdx = -1u, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SuccIdx = -1u) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((From-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a09de70cbaf2f15aa3b0697b5f378cc9d">getParent</a>() == To-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a09de70cbaf2f15aa3b0697b5f378cc9d">getParent</a>()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Can&#39;t connect two block with different parents&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((SuccIdx != -1u || From-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a2c13ffed8c55e1b8dd38fedc7e71e7a8">getNumSuccessors</a>() &lt; 2) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Blocks can&#39;t have more than two successors.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SuccIdx == -1u)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">      From-&gt;appendSuccessor(To);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">      From-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#aeccf6a036968755c6d86e2d2bb17673a">getSuccessors</a>()&#91;SuccIdx&#93; = To;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PredIdx == -1u)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">      To-&gt;appendPredecessor(From);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">      To-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a73370de0db181ec55a9ad0b7a3a78a88">getPredecessors</a>()&#91;PredIdx&#93; = From;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Disconnect VPBlockBases \\p From and \\p To bi-directionally. Remove \\p To</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// from the successors of \\p From and \\p From from the predecessors of \\p To.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a61f1451694a3638db85170c7f55d5581"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a61f1451694a3638db85170c7f55d5581">disconnectBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;To) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(To &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Successor to disconnect is null.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    From-&gt;removeSuccessor(To);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    To-&gt;removePredecessor(From);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Reassociate all the blocks connected to \\p Old so that they now point to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p New.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a63345282cd67ea46202fb33523be1408"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a63345282cd67ea46202fb33523be1408">reassociateBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;Old, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;New) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Pred : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a886094eaed7ce32029ea52a641142b88">to&#95;vector</a>(Old-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a73370de0db181ec55a9ad0b7a3a78a88">getPredecessors</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">      Pred-&gt;replaceSuccessor(Old, New);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a886094eaed7ce32029ea52a641142b88">to&#95;vector</a>(Old-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#aeccf6a036968755c6d86e2d2bb17673a">getSuccessors</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">      Succ-&gt;replacePredecessor(Old, New);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">    New-&gt;setPredecessors(Old-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a73370de0db181ec55a9ad0b7a3a78a88">getPredecessors</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    New-&gt;setSuccessors(Old-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#aeccf6a036968755c6d86e2d2bb17673a">getSuccessors</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    Old-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#abbad647e343d37f18c1bb642fa424c76">clearPredecessors</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">    Old-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a9e077642586377d67713ebfc26bceef3">clearSuccessors</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return an iterator range over \\p Range which only includes \\p BlockTy</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// blocks. The accesses are casted to \\p BlockTy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockTy, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a0360eea6cebcb1470f84b11f7ba51f16"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a0360eea6cebcb1470f84b11f7ba51f16">blocksOnly</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create BaseTy with correct const-ness based on BlockTy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">BaseTy = std::conditional&#95;t&lt;std::is&#95;const&lt;BlockTy&gt;::value,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a>&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to first create an iterator range over (const) BlocktTy &amp; instead</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of (const) BlockTy &#42; for filter&#95;range to work properly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Mapped =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a51c7cbd21e1104ee6841c18d7daa6edb">map&#95;range</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>, &#91;&#93;(BaseTy &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) -&gt; BaseTy &amp; &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>; &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaee5189b9c4db9ad666a88abaf1ee0c4ad7778d0c64b6ba21494c97f77a66885a">Filter</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a898e9304cf2baf908f4e9b8e32a5f6c3">make&#95;filter&#95;range</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">        Mapped, &#91;&#93;(BaseTy &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;BlockTy&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>); &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a51c7cbd21e1104ee6841c18d7daa6edb">map&#95;range</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaee5189b9c4db9ad666a88abaf1ee0c4ad7778d0c64b6ba21494c97f77a66885a">Filter</a>, &#91;&#93;(BaseTy &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/hotcoldsplitting-cpp/#a0134180716271c522b7b0e1537ce7d9b">BlockTy</a> &#42; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;BlockTy&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Inserts \\p BlockPtr on the edge between \\p From and \\p To. That is, update</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p From&#39;s successor to \\p To to point to \\p BlockPtr and \\p To&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// predecessor from \\p From to \\p BlockPtr. \\p From and \\p To are added to \\p</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// BlockPtr&#39;s predecessors and successors respectively. There must be a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// single edge between \\p From and \\p To.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a2057d0749eedf6749f9e1cc6694eb1fd"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a2057d0749eedf6749f9e1cc6694eb1fd">insertOnEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;To,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42;BlockPtr) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Successors = From-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#aeccf6a036968755c6d86e2d2bb17673a">getSuccessors</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Predecessors = To-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase/#a73370de0db181ec55a9ad0b7a3a78a88">getPredecessors</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(Successors, To) == 1 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(Predecessors, From) == 1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;must have single between From and To&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SuccIdx = std::distance(Successors.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">find</a>(Successors, To));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PredIx =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::distance(Predecessors.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">find</a>(Predecessors, From));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a40bc7fec35d7093efcdbadf566d6b5ee">VPBlockUtils::connectBlocks</a>(From, BlockPtr, -1, SuccIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockutils/#a40bc7fec35d7093efcdbadf566d6b5ee">VPBlockUtils::connectBlocks</a>(BlockPtr, To, PredIx, -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
